title: Book of Air
data:
{{version028}} {{spellbook info}} ==Spells== {{spellbook|Book of Air}} ==Use== [[Air Magic]] has a variety of applications, and this book is no exception: *[[Swiftness]] allows you to outrun most foes while zapping them with [[Shock]], and tougher foes can usually be manoeuvred into position for a [[doublezap|double-zap]]. *[[Airstrike]] is a useful spell for elemental specialists who lack the means to deal with enemies immune to their attacks. It is also useful for summoners, as they can fire past their summoned creatures without fear. ==Further reading== The [[Book of the Sky]], [[Book of Storms]], and [[Book of Lightning]] contain more advanced Air Magic. ==History== *[[0.27]] [[Lightning Bolt]] and [[Static Discharge]] were removed from the book.
Prior to this version, this was the starting book for [[Air Elementalist|Air Elementalists]] (starting books were replaced by sets of spells). *[[0.20]] Added [[Airstrike]] and removed [[Repel Missiles]]. *[[0.17]] Removed [[Flight (spell)|Flight]] from the game. *[[0.10]] Added [[Flight (spell)|Flight]] instead of [[Levitation]]. *[[0.9]] Added [[Lightning Bolt]] and removed [[Mephitic Cloud]].
